description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府与美利坚合众国政府共同对外发表的三个外交声明的合称，是双方在冷战时期开启对话和关系正常化的重要基础。
description.en: A collective term for three diplomatic statements jointly issued by the Government of the People's Republic of China and the Government of the United States of America, forming an important basis for dialogue and normalization of relations during the Cold War.

en: Government of the People's Republic of China
Government of the United States of America

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国和美利坚合众国联合公报

description.zh-cn: 中美三个联合公报中的第一个，于尼克松访华期间在上海签署，开启了中美关系正常化的进程。
description.en: The first of the Three Joint Communiqués, signed in Shanghai during Nixon's visit to China, initiating the process of normalizing Sino-US relations.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国和美利坚合众国关于建立外交关系的联合公报
en: Joint Communiqué on the Establishment of Diplomatic Relations

description.zh-cn: 中美三个联合公报中的第二个，宣布双方建立正式的大使级外交关系。
description.en: The second of the Three Joint Communiqués, announcing the establishment of formal ambassadorial-level diplomatic relations between the two sides.

zh-cn: 中美就解决美国向台出售武器问题的公告

description.zh-cn: 中美三个联合公报中的第三个，旨在解决美国对台军售问题。
description.en: The third of the Three Joint Communiqués, aimed at resolving the issue of U.S. arms sales to Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 指代与台湾政治地位相关的复杂地缘政治议题。
description.en: Refers to the complex geopolitical issues related to the political status of Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 美国的一项外交政策，基于中美三个联合公报、六项保证和《台湾关系法》制定。
description.en: A diplomatic policy of the United States based on the Three Joint Communiqués, the Six Assurances, and the Taiwan Relations Act.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府在发布《八一七公报》的同时，作为其单方面内容说明而提出的对台承诺。
description.en: Commitments made by the U.S. government to Taiwan, presented as a unilateral explanation concurrent with the issuance of the August 17th Communiqué.

nodes.id: 一个中国 (中华人民共和国)

zh-cn: 一个中国 (中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主张的政治原则，认为世界上只有一个中国，中华人民共和国政府是全中国的唯一合法政府，台湾是中国的一部分。
description.en: A political principle asserted by the People's Republic of China, which holds that there is only one China in the world, the government of the PRC is the sole legal government of all China, and Taiwan is a part of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国第37任总统，任内推动了中美关系的正常化。
description.en: The 37th President of the United States, who promoted the normalization of relations with China during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国总统尼克松对中华人民共和国的国事访问，是中美关系史上的一个转折点，访问期间签署了《上海公报》。
description.en: The state visit of then-U.S. President Richard Nixon to the People's Republic of China, a turning point in the history of Sino-US relations, during which the Shanghai Communiqué was signed.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华人民共和国国务院总理，与尼克松共同签署了《上海公报》。
description.en: Then-Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, who co-signed the Shanghai Communiqué with Richard Nixon.

description.zh-cn: 一种主张中华人民共和国和中华民国（台湾）是两个独立主权国家的政治观点。
description.en: A political viewpoint advocating that the People's Republic of China and the Republic of China (Taiwan) are two separate sovereign states.

description.zh-cn: 一种认为在一个中国的主权框架下存在两个合法政府的政治观点。
description.en: A political viewpoint that posits the existence of two legitimate governments within the sovereign framework of one China.

description.zh-cn: 一种认为同时存在中华人民共和国和中华民国两个独立主权国家的政治观点。
description.en: A political viewpoint that posits the concurrent existence of two independent sovereign states, the People's Republic of China and the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 旨在建立一个独立于中国的，以台湾为领土的主权国家的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement aimed at establishing a sovereign state with Taiwan as its territory, independent from China.

en: Theory of the Undetermined Status of Taiwan

description.zh-cn: 一种认为台湾的主权归属在法律上尚未确定的理论。
description.en: A theory holding that the sovereignty of Taiwan has not yet been legally determined.

description.zh-cn: 一个政治原则，其核心思想是世界上只有一个代表中国的国家。各方对其具体含义有不同解释。
description.en: A political principle whose core idea is that there is only one state representing China. Various parties have different interpretations of its specific meaning.

zh-cn: 驻台美军设施和武装力量
en: United States military personnel in Taiwan

description.zh-cn: 中华民国外交官，曾任驻美大使。
description.en: A diplomat of the Republic of China, who served as ambassador to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第二代主要领导人，在《中美建交公报》公布后访问美国。
description.en: The paramount leader of the second generation of the People's Republic of China, who visited the United States after the announcement of the Joint Communiqué on the Establishment of Diplomatic Relations.

en: Deng Xiaoping's 1979 visit to the United States and Japan

description.zh-cn: 时任中国国务院副总理邓小平对美国和日本进行的国事访问。
description.en: The state visit of then-Vice Premier of China Deng Xiaoping to the United States and Japan.

en: Government of the Republic of China
United States arms sales to Taiwan

description.zh-cn: 美国向台湾出售武器的长期政策和行为，是中美关系中的一个核心争议点。
description.en: The long-standing policy and practice of the United States selling arms to Taiwan, a central point of contention in Sino-US relations.

description.zh-cn: 美国第40任总统，其政府发布了《八一七公报》和《六项保证》。
description.en: The 40th President of the United States, whose administration issued the August 17th Communiqué and the Six Assurances.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾在里根政府担任国务卿。
description.en: American politician who served as Secretary of State in the Reagan administration.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾在里根政府担任国防部长。
description.en: American politician who served as Secretary of Defense in the Reagan administration.

description.zh-cn: 负责美国与台湾非官方关系的机构。
description.en: The organization responsible for handling the unofficial relations between the United States and Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 作为签署方之一，与美国政府共同发表了《上海公报》。
description.en: As one of the signatories, jointly issued the Shanghai Communiqué with the U.S. government.

description.zh-cn: 作为签署方之一，与中华人民共和国政府共同发表了《上海公报》。
description.en: As one of the signatories, jointly issued the Shanghai Communiqué with the government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 作为签署方之一，与美国政府共同发表了《中美建交公报》。
description.en: As one of the signatories, jointly issued the Joint Communiqué on the Establishment of Diplomatic Relations with the U.S. government.

description.zh-cn: 作为签署方之一，与中华人民共和国政府共同发表了《中美建交公报》。
description.en: As one of the signatories, jointly issued the Joint Communiqué on the Establishment of Diplomatic Relations with the government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 作为签署方之一，与美国政府共同发表了《八一七公报》。
description.en: As one of the signatories, jointly issued the August 17th Communiqué with the U.S. government.

description.zh-cn: 作为签署方之一，与中华人民共和国政府共同发表了《八一七公报》。
description.en: As one of the signatories, jointly issued the August 17th Communiqué with the government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 《上海公报》是在1972年尼克松访华期间签署的主要成果。
description.en: The Shanghai Communiqué was the main achievement signed during Nixon's 1972 visit to China.

description.zh-cn: 代表美国政府签署了《上海公报》。
description.en: Signed the Shanghai Communiqué on behalf of the United States government.

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理
position.en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 代表中华人民共和国政府签署了《上海公报》。
description.en: Signed the Shanghai Communiqué on behalf of the government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 《上海公报》中，美方承诺将逐步减少驻台美军设施和武装力量，此后驻台美军人数开始下降。
description.en: In the Shanghai Communiqué, the U.S. side pledged to progressively reduce its military installations and armed forces in Taiwan, after which the number of U.S. troops in Taiwan began to decline.

description.zh-cn: 在该公报中，美国政府承认中华人民共和国政府是中国的唯一合法政府，加强了其在国际上的合法性。
description.en: In this communiqué, the U.S. government recognized the government of the People's Republic of China as the sole legal government of China, enhancing its international legitimacy.

description.zh-cn: 美国在该公报中承认中华人民共和国政府为中国唯一合法政府，是对坚持拥有全中国主权的中华民国政府的又一次外交打击。
description.en: The U.S. recognition of the PRC government as the sole legal government of China in this communiqué was another diplomatic blow to the Republic of China government, which still claimed sovereignty over all of China.

description.zh-cn: 该决议导致中华民国政府失去在联合国的中国代表权，是其在国际外交上的重大挫折。
description.en: This resolution caused the Government of the Republic of China to lose its representation of China in the United Nations, a major setback in its international diplomacy.

description.zh-cn: 《中美建交公报》在邓小平访美前夕公布，为此次访问铺平了道路。
description.en: The Joint Communiqué on the Establishment of Diplomatic Relations was announced on the eve of Deng Xiaoping's visit to the U.S., paving the way for the visit.

description.zh-cn: 该公报旨在彻底停止美国对台武器出售问题，美方在公报中承诺准备逐步减少对台军售。
description.en: This communiqué was intended to bring about a final resolution to the issue of U.S. arms sales to Taiwan, with the U.S. side promising in the communiqué that it was prepared to gradually reduce its arms sales to Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 其总统任内，美国政府在发布八一七公报的同时，向台湾提出六项保证作为单方面说明。
description.en: During his presidency, the U.S. government, concurrent with the issuance of the August 17th Communiqué, presented the Six Assurances to Taiwan as a unilateral explanation.

description.zh-cn: 《六项保证》是美国政府作为对《八一七公报》的单方面内容说明而提出的，影响了美方对该公报的解释和执行。
description.en: The Six Assurances were presented by the U.S. government as a unilateral explanation of the August 17th Communiqué, influencing the U.S. interpretation and implementation of the communiqué.

description.zh-cn: 在签署《八一七公报》当天，里根发布内部备忘录，将美国减少对台军售的意愿与中国推行和平解决方案的前提联系起来，为持续对台军售提供了依据。
description.en: On the same day the August 17th Communiqué was signed, Reagan issued an internal memorandum linking the U.S. willingness to reduce arms sales to Taiwan to the premise of China's continued pursuit of a peaceful solution, providing a basis for continued arms sales to Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·舒尔茨在罗纳德·里根总统任内担任国务卿。
description.en: George Shultz served as Secretary of State under President Ronald Reagan.

description.zh-cn: 卡斯帕·温伯格在罗纳德·里根总统任内担任国防部长。
description.en: Caspar Weinberger served as Secretary of Defense under President Ronald Reagan.

description.zh-cn: 尼克松访华后，亲自向时任中华民国驻美大使沈剑虹说明情况并提出保证。
description.en: After his visit to China, Nixon personally met with James Shen, then the Republic of China's ambassador to the U.S., to explain the situation and offer assurances.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府主张其“一个中国政策”是基于包括《上海公报》在内的文件制订的。
description.en: The U.S. government maintains that its 'One-China Policy' is based on documents including the Shanghai Communiqué.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府主张其“一个中国政策”是基于包括《中美建交公报》在内的文件制订的。
description.en: The U.S. government maintains that its 'One-China Policy' is based on documents including the Joint Communiqué on the Establishment of Diplomatic Relations.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府主张其“一个中国政策”是基于包括《八一七公报》在内的文件制订的。
description.en: The U.S. government maintains that its 'One-China Policy' is based on documents including the August 17th Communiqué.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府主张其“一个中国政策”是基于包括《六项保证》在内的文件制订的。
description.en: The U.S. government maintains that its 'One-China Policy' is based on documents including the Six Assurances.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府主张其“一个中国政策”是基于包括《台湾关系法》在内的文件制订的。
description.en: The U.S. government maintains that its 'One-China Policy' is based on documents including the Taiwan Relations Act.

description.zh-cn: 在《上海公报》中，中方坚决反对任何旨在制造“一中一台”的活动。
description.en: In the Shanghai Communiqué, the Chinese side firmly opposed any activities aimed at creating 'One China, One Taiwan'.

description.zh-cn: 在《上海公报》中，中方坚决反对任何旨在制造“一个中国、两个政府”的活动。
description.en: In the Shanghai Communiqué, the Chinese side firmly opposed any activities aimed at creating 'One China, two governments'.

description.zh-cn: 在《上海公报》中，中方坚决反对任何旨在制造“两个中国”的活动。
description.en: In the Shanghai Communiqué, the Chinese side firmly opposed any activities aimed at creating 'Two Chinas'.

description.zh-cn: 在《上海公报》中，中方坚决反对任何旨在制造“台湾独立”的活动。
description.en: In the Shanghai Communiqué, the Chinese side firmly opposed any activities aimed at creating 'Taiwan independence'.

description.zh-cn: 在《上海公报》中，中方坚决反对任何鼓吹“台湾地位未定论”的活动。
description.en: In the Shanghai Communiqué, the Chinese side firmly opposed any activities that advocated the 'Theory of the Undetermined Status of Taiwan'.

description.zh-cn: 美国在台协会于2020年公布了关于六项保证内容的解密电报。
description.en: In 2020, the American Institute in Taiwan published declassified telegrams regarding the content of the Six Assurances.
